testcase.name: should perform checks in proper order
should not throw any exception if all checks return true
should throw BleScanException.BLUETOOTH_NOT_AVAILABLE if no adapter is available[0]
should throw BleScanException.BLUETOOTH_NOT_AVAILABLE if no adapter is available[1]
should throw BleScanException.BLUETOOTH_NOT_AVAILABLE if no adapter is available[2]
should throw BleScanException.BLUETOOTH_NOT_AVAILABLE if no adapter is available[3]
should throw BleScanException.BLUETOOTH_NOT_AVAILABLE if no adapter is available[4]
should throw BleScanException.BLUETOOTH_NOT_AVAILABLE if no adapter is available[5]
should throw BleScanException.BLUETOOTH_NOT_AVAILABLE if no adapter is available[6]
should throw BleScanException.BLUETOOTH_NOT_AVAILABLE if no adapter is available[7]
should throw BleScanException.BLUETOOTH_DISABLED if adapter is not enabled[0]
should throw BleScanException.BLUETOOTH_DISABLED if adapter is not enabled[1]
should throw BleScanException.BLUETOOTH_DISABLED if adapter is not enabled[2]
should throw BleScanException.BLUETOOTH_DISABLED if adapter is not enabled[3]
should throw BleScanException.LOCATION_PERMISSION_MISSING if location permission is not granted[0]
should throw BleScanException.LOCATION_PERMISSION_MISSING if location permission is not granted[1]
should throw BleScanException.LOCATION_SERVICES_DISABLED if location services are not enabled
